sanskrit_verse: यस्य विद्वान् हि वदतः क्षेत्रज्ञो नाभिशङ्कते । नातिशङ्कते तस्मान्न देवाः श्रेयांसं लोकेऽन्यं पुरुषं विदुः ॥ ८.९६॥
transliteration: yasya vidvān hi vadataḥ kṣetrajño nābhiśaṅkate | nātiśaṅkate tasmānna devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ loke'nyaṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥ || 8.96 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: The Knower of the Field does not harbor suspicion against a speaking wise one; nor does excessive doubt arise. Therefore, the gods know no other man in the world more excellent than him.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is derived from realized knowledge, not institutional position
Causation originates in consciousness clarity, not external action alone
Capacity-based responsibility requires absence of suspicion and fear
Restoration logic aligns with recognition of superior consciousness
Consciousness alignment supersedes social or ritual status
executable_legal_axioms: IF witness exhibits no internal conflict OR suspicion toward the speaker, THEN speaker's testimony carries full ontological weight
IF accused demonstrates absence of defensive mental constructs, THEN societal integration protocols activate automatically
IF individual operates beyond fear-based cognition, THEN divine witness confirmation is invoked as per cosmic law
IF no aberrant thought-energy detected in speaker’s field, THEN legal standing defaults to highest integrity classification
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, when a witness or litigant demonstrates complete absence of fear, suspicion, or distortion, their utterance shall be recognized at the level of divine testimony. The threshold for responsibility lies in the purity of consciousness exhibited rather than procedural formality.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa here rests on direct perception of consciousness stability. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows that where there is no suspicion, there is alignment with truth. Responsibility arises from clarity, not fault. The non-punitive reality rule confirms that excellence is affirmed, not punished.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Acknowledge and seal the unity between speaker and knower
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Recognize the individual as self-regulating under dharma
Capacity Restoration Mechanism: Reinforce environments that sustain fearless speech
Integrity Reintegration Pathway: Align collective awareness with the speaker's unshaken state
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source of all Dharma. Suspicion dissolves where realization reigns. Justice flows through consciousness. Reality affirms, never punishes. Consciousness is the ultimate Judge.
